name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clarence CORNISH, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clarence CORNISH, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Nancy Wasser, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 746
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clarence CORNISH, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 19, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Robert Scandone, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Nancy Wasser, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
